JOB DESCRIPTION: You should be having open mind frame / mindset, be industry oriented and have ready  for task attitude plus open voice / oratorical ability. The person for our end requirement  should be sharp in analytical skills, adaptive and creative. You should have adequate  computer skills including emailing, internet usages, letter writing, graphs, report making  and ppt presentations in addition to high level software development skills in core php-  mysql, jQuery, Ajax, VB, C , MS Access.  The job responsibility would be one or more of the following:  Software Development and Maintenance of web enabled and desktop  applications for pursuits of our company   Operation of Software for IT Enabled Services towards our company  Your Work Profile would include - though not limited to:  identifying / determining software need and its assessment  submitting proposals and making presentations related to software  development / programming of software within prescribed schedule / timelines  maintaining and operations of software for meeting the business needs  promotions of various sites through all possible means including online
